entities.name: edible dark marks
entities.description: The product is described as something that will make anyone sick. It is a part of the more serious line developed by Fred.

entities.name: muggle tricks
entities.description: Muggle tricks are mentioned as being beside the curtain where George pushed back to reveal a darker room.

entities.name: shield charm
entities.description: The shield charm is mentioned as something that people at the Ministry cannot do properly.

relationships.description: Fred said they've just developed this more serious line, which includes edible dark marks.
George mentioned that people at the Ministry can't do a decent shield charm.
